title: No Verification Email Sent for Support Ticket Request
body: I cannot submit a report ticket because the verification email I was supposed to receive has not arrived, even after the several minutes promised by the prompt appearing after I click the link to submit a ticket.  How can I submit a support ticket?

replies.body: Double check the spam folder just in case it fell in there.  Don't worry if not, we can help!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which allows you to use an email you have access to, and our account team can update your info.  See you there!

Thanks for replying.  I have since solved the problem by clicking the "Verify Email" link, which led me through a process to receive the email.  I suggest that this link be displayed more prominently, or that the verification email be sent automatically, without the user having to guess which link to click and then take the aforementioned additional steps.  Also, your customer service is excellent.
